entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is grateful for Harry's offer to help him. He has heard of Harry's greatness and goodness.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts who is humble and modest according to Dobby. He is not top of his year and has had triumphs over Voldemort.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is top of her year, but Harry's mention of her causes him pain.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are the family that Harry lives with and whom Dobby is trying to avoid being discovered by.

relationships.description: Harry offers to help Dobby, but Dobby's gratitude causes him to dissolve into wails.
Harry mentions Hermione as being top of her year at Hogwarts, causing him pain.
